name: Stichting Leergeld
short_description: Helps children from low-income families with school, sports, culture and wellbeing costs (e.g., school supplies, laptop, bike, sports club).
eligibility_plain_language: For families with limited income. You apply through the local Leergeld foundation in your municipality (postcode search).
required_documents: Proof of identity (if requested by the local foundation)
Details of the child(ren) (age/school if relevant)
Quote/invoice or description of what is needed (e.g., laptop, school items)
how_to_apply: Go to the Leergeld website and search by postcode for your local foundation
Start the application via the local foundation

name: Nationaal Fonds Kinderhulp
short_description: Supports children and young people (0–21) growing up in poverty with practical help (e.g., clothing, school needs, activities).
eligibility_plain_language: Parents cannot apply directly. A professional helper (e.g., social worker, municipal wijkteam, youth worker) submits the application for the child.
required_documents: Contact details of a professional helper (social worker / wijkteam / youth care / debt counselor)
Basic family situation summary (income/stressors) prepared by the professional
Details of the child(ren) and what support is needed
Quote/invoice or cost estimate for the requested item/activity (if applicable)
how_to_apply: Contact a professional helper (wijkteam / social worker / debt counselor)
The professional registers and submits the request via Kinderhulp’s application process
notes: Important for trust: clearly explain that a helper is needed to apply.

name: SUN Nederland (Stichting Urgente Noden)
administrator: SUN Nederland (network of local emergency aid agencies)
short_description: Emergency financial support for urgent needs when other provisions are not available in time (donation or interest-free loan, via local SUN agencies).
eligibility_plain_language: You cannot apply directly. A professional helper submits an urgent request to the local SUN agency for your municipality when no (timely) other solution exists.
required_documents: Contact details of a professional helper (social worker / wijkteam / debt counselor)
Proof of urgent financial need (rent arrears, essential bills, emergency costs)
Proof that other options (e.g., municipal schemes) are not available / not fast enough
Bank statements / income overview (usually requested by the helper)
how_to_apply: Ask a professional helper in your municipality to contact the local SUN agency
The helper submits the urgent request with supporting documents
notes: SUN only processes requests through professionals; the website explains this clearly.

name: Noodfonds Energie
administrator: Noodfonds Energie (national emergency fund for energy costs)
short_description: Temporary support for households with high energy bills and lower incomes (when applications are open).
eligibility_plain_language: Availability depends on whether the fund is open. If open, eligibility is based on household income and energy costs (rules shown on the website).
required_documents: DigiD or identity verification method (if required during the application)
how_to_apply: Check if the fund is currently open on the official website
Apply online via noodfondsenergie.nl and follow the steps shown there
notes: This fund may open/close depending on the period; always show 'check availability'.
